data.title: Kill Bill = Charlies Angels?
data.meta_description:
Am I the only one that thought Kill bill was just an extension of the Charlies angles series?
They seem so similar to me.
Just watched the trailer, looked...
data.meta_site_name: AnandTech Forums: Technology, Hardware, Software, and Deals
data.text:
OK, so from what I gather from IMDB, it's basically one long movie that's being released in two parts in the theater? Bah. I'm not a huge fan of Tarantino, I might see this one if the response is good here.

This made me laugh (from the IMDB message boards for Kill Bill: Volume 2):

has anyone heard how they will release the movie on dvd i mean supposibly i suspect that they will release kill bill 1 on dvd probally after kill bill volume 2 comes out i mean i dont think that they will release them together just becasue miramax are a bunch of a holes.

Any one else hear how they release it i mean like they do a special edition with both parts on 1 dvd or will they wait a while for that.

Originally posted by: JimRaynor

I'm a big fan of some of the stuff that Tarantino has done, but this kill bill thing sounds kind of weird. I disagree with some of the casting... Uma Thurman as a samurai broad?? Lucy Liu??? *sigh*

I thought Lucy Liu was the samurai thing (which is not possible since only men can be samurai in japanese culture, just because you play with swords dont make you a samurai).

Originally posted by: Zim Hosein

Originally posted by: JimRaynor

I'm a big fan of some of the stuff that Tarantino has done, but this kill bill thing sounds kind of weird. I disagree with some of the casting... Uma Thurman as a samurai broad?? Lucy Liu??? *sigh*

I personally feel this will be a "sleeper" hit because the premise for the movie is awesome IMO, but the "teaser" trailers don't intrigue the average movie audience

so whats the premise
